notes:
This spatial dataset provides the delimitation and composition of the Papua New Guinea national boundary. It comprises 22 Provincial boundaries, and is attributed with the country name in English. This dataset was obtained from the National Statistics Office in 2000 and has been edited by WFP and OCHA to include the provinces of Hela and Jiwaka which were established in 2012. 

This dataset was provided to  the UN-OCHA Regional Office for the Asia-Pacific by the National Statistics Office.
